name: Signal Trader
tag_list: signals, automatic-trading, auto-execution, forex, indices, commodities, finance
overview:
I.S. Signal Trader was established in order to provide the best possible real time trading rooms, bridging the gap between people with an interest in trading and market experts.

Signal Trader provides clients with an innovative “window” into live trading rooms, so clients can watch experts implement strategies in real time, online as they trade. In addition, the clients can see the expertsâ€™ open positions, trading history, account balance, equity, margin and profits, in real time.

Signal Trader also offers trading signal alerts based on the experts trading activity via email or on the charts displayed in each trading room. The website has been designed so that traders of all levels of expertise can observe and learn from prop traders, as they trade.

Signal Trader clients are able to automate their trading based on the signals from their preferred prop traders. Furthermore, clients can build their own portfolio based on the trading activity of the experts the clients wish to follow.

Finally, clients have the option to control their desired level of risk and trade size per expert and instrument.
